H0.text: Which motor manufacturer makes the Cee'd and Picanto models. Hyundai

H1.text: Which motor manufacturer makes the Cee'd and Picanto models. Toyota

H2.text: Which motor manufacturer makes the Cee'd and Picanto models. Ford

H3.text: Which motor manufacturer makes the Cee'd and Picanto models. KIA

A4.text: The Picanto was Kia's best selling vehicle in Europe from 2004 to 2006.

A5.text: In 2018, the Kia Picanto GT Cup was established in Portugal by Kia Motors Portugal and CRM Motorsport.
